data.name: Bill
data.detailed_description:
Bill is a master in crafting who needs to help a baby alien who crashed in his garden by keeping him alive and building a rocket based on his broken engine.

Key Features :

  • Crafting
    Everything you need in the game is craftable.
  • Building
    Create new rooms or utilities and place them where you want.
  • Farming
    Plant and grow your own vegetables.
  • Restoring
    Take any broken item and give it a new life using your master skills.
  • Buy and sell online
    Buy online broken devices, restore them with new parts, and sell them for a better price.
  • Take care of the baby alien and yourself
    Sleep, eat well and entertain yourself, it's not only about work.
  • Decorate your home
    Use plants, lamps, paintings, posters to decorate your home and make it as cozy as you like.

data.short_description: Bill is a master in crafting, restoring, and building - Craft tools, items, and upgrades for your home - Grow your food - Take care of yourself - Make money online by shipping your creations. Help a baby alien who crashed in your garden by feeding him and building a homemade rocket.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11, 64-bit versions only.
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, and DX12-capable GPUs
